summary:
This is a simple lore-improving mod I made for personal use that I am offering to the public.

This mod gives Absorb Health and Frost Cloak to Hagravens.
descriptionHtml:
[quote]"...vivid red light began to form in the palm of its talons, it was all I could do to raise my shield in defense of magic most foul. I fought through devilry that seemed to snatch life from me..."

-Herbane's Bestiary: Hagravens[/quote]

While my first Hagraven encounter was a rather nasty surprise (too many Fireballs!), the Hagraven has always somewhat disappointed me. Considering they are supposed to be powerful magic users, I always felt that their spell selection was too limited. This mod attempts to correct that while staying true to Skyrim's relatively "low-magic" style.

Absorb Health and Frost Cloak were added to conform to the description of Hagravens in in-game lore (see quote above) and because they (IMO) fit with the necromancy-oriented nature of Hagravens. As of version 1.1 Hagravens also possess the ability to conjure ice wraiths.
